chat_history.message:
Hello,
My Galaxy S21 5G is experiencing the following problem:
Impossible to put phone in charge, error message, despite following guidelines; impossible to remove error message, therefore unable to recharge phone.
Thank you for your help,

Once the package is received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or home appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, within 2 business days to process a refund (if eligible). A return is considered complete when the customer has met all the following conditions:
✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by a third party and has not suffered any damage due to a fall or exposure to water.
✔ Confirms that personal data has been erased.
✔ Has confirmed having the return label.
✔ Understands that they must include accessories as well as proof of purchase in their package
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.
Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or home appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, within 2 business days to process a refund (if eligible).

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS
